name: LTB Media
description: LTB Media was founded in 2009 and is based in Poland. The company's main goal is to improve the display, recognition and image of companies on the Internet. As an interactive agency, LTB takes actions in order to enhance brand confidence. This increase in confidence will, in turn, lead to the success of their clients. LTB's employees focus on website design through the use of modern tools. One of LTB's secondary goals is to help foreign businesses become more recognizable on the Internet.

locations.address: LTB SP. Z O.O. UL. DRUKARSKA 38
